snippet: A World Economic Forum survey of 144 countries noted that a growing north-south divide was one of the factors at the heart of the continuing euro zone crisis.
abstract: World Economic Forum survey of 144 countries notes that a growing north-south divide is one of the factors at the heart of the continuing euro zone crisis; rankings show a vast difference between the best- and worst-performing nations in the 17-nation single currency area.
lead_paragraph: A World Economic Forum survey of 144 countries noted that a growing north-south divide was one of the factors at the heart of the continuing euro zone crisis.

headline.main: Competitiveness Gap Widening in Europe, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Competition Gap Grows In Europe, Study Says
